author: vmassol
msg: - externalized most external hrefs to the sitemap.xml file using the new href="ext:xxx" notation
- replaced all internal links by using the new href="site:xxx" notation
- improved spacing for the sitemap HTML generated page
- improved doc generation speed a little
- renamed <page> into <resource> in sitemap.xml and removed the unneeded "type" attribute
- removed support for <a href=""> for now (only <link href=""> is supported)
- started to move xdoc files in their respective directories
- added the sitemap link to the left menu
